author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM LORENA STRENGTHENING AND FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE TOMORROW... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES ISSUES FOR WESTERN PORTION OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR...
summary: ...TROPICAL STORM LORENA STRENGTHENING AND FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE TOMORROW... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES ISSUES FOR WESTERN PORTION OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... As of 2:00 PM MST Tue Sep 02 the center of Lorena was located near 19.4, -109.0 with movement NW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL STORM LORENA STRENGTHENING AND FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE TOMORROW... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES ISSUES FOR WESTERN PORTION OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... As of 2:00 PM MST Tue Sep 02 the center of Lorena was located near 19.4, -109.0 with movement NW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Lorena (EP2/EP122025)
